title: Croker Diaries: Justice Be Mine
description: Revised May 2015. Ryan Croker loved the law. As a child, he dreamt of someday standing in a court of law arguing his case. After passing the Bar, Ryan launches his own law practice, assembling a legal team of friends, who quickly learns how competitive it is in Los Angeles area. After several months of struggling, Ryan takes on a sexual harassment case against a large corporation, nobody else wanted. As the case progresses, Ryan discovers the lawsuit is just a coverup for something much larger and sinister. Justice Be Mine takes the reader on a legal roller coaster of twist and turns, with a rookie attorney facing a plethora of insurmountable odds.
author: Michael  Burton
